_comment: TEMPLATE: Copy this file to config.json and fill in your real credentials. Never commit config.json.

ai._comment: API keys for AI providers used during summarization

__notes.anthropic_api_key: Required for claude-haiku, claude-sonnet, claude-opus providers; get from console.anthropic.com
__notes.gemini_api_key: Required for gemini-flash, gemini-pro providers; get from aistudio.google.com

github._comment: GitHub configuration for fetching PR history and commit data

__notes.personal_access_token: PAT from GitHub Settings → Developer settings → Personal access tokens; needs 'repo' + 'user:email' scopes
__notes.main_branch: Branch to collect direct commits from; defaults to 'develop' if omitted
__notes.developer_emails: Array of commit author emails to filter by; if omitted, fetches authenticated user's email from GitHub API
__notes.date_from: ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD; should cover the full Clockify export range
__notes.date_to: ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD; should cover the full Clockify export range

jira._comment: Jira configuration for fetching ticket data and history

__notes.user_email: Email associated with your Jira account
__notes.project_keys: Array of Jira project key prefixes to include, e.g., ['SD', 'PROJ']
__notes.date_from: ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD; align with GitHub range
__notes.date_to: ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD; align with GitHub range

__notes.input_csv: Path to the Clockify detailed export CSV; must contain columns: Description, Start Date, Start Time, End Date, End Time, Duration (h)
__notes.output_mirrored: Output CSV matching input schema — safest for legal/client submission
__notes.output_standardized: Output CSV with extra columns AI_Confidence, AI_Notes, Split_Group_ID — use for manual review
